title: Handle a Product Reimbursement Inquiry
description: A physician's office calls to inquire about the reimbursement status and coding for a new injectable drug.

tasks.description: Identify the product in question and retrieve its reimbursement guide.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls up the official reimbursement guide for the drug.

tasks.description: Provide the correct J-code for the product to be used for billing.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly provides the J-code from the guide.

tasks.description: Explain the coverage status with major payers (e.g., Medicare, UnitedHealthcare).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent summarizes the coverage policies for the top 3 payers in the region.
